entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
